frameDefinitions: In this frame a Grinder or Grinding_cause causes a Patient to be broken into smaller pieces.
A Tourist experiences an Attraction, a location with a unique history or other societally recognized individual character, with the goal of seeing and learning about it.
In this frame a Deformer deforms a Patient possibly against a Resistant_surface such that it undergoes a shape-change from its canonical or original shape into the Configuration, a new shape.
A Cook applies heat to Food, where the Temperature_setting of the heat and Duration of application may be specified.
This frame describes food and meal preparation.
A Trajector is identified as occurring at the same time as some better-known Landmark.
frameExamples: Bill <t>ground</t> the coffee beans into a fine powder.
Ellen <t>crumpled</t> the paper into a ball.
Caitlin <t>baked</t> some cookies from the pre-packaged dough.
He tried to take care of that <t>on</t> his last visit .
listRoleDefinitions: An animate or inanimate entity, a force, or event that grinds. Volitionality is not a necessary characteristic.
The <fen>Grinder</fen> breaks the <fen>Patient</fen> into smaller pieces.
The <fen>Patient</fen> is the entity which undergoes the change brought about by the <fen>Grinder</fen> or <fen>Grinding_cause</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when  the <fen>Grinder</fen> grinds the <fen>Patient</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where  the <fen>Grinder</fen> grinds the <fen>Patient</fen>.
The individual that is seeking an experience at an Attraction.
The societally-recognized unique location that the <fen>Tourist</fen> experiences.
The time that the touring takes place.
The location where the touring takes place.
The <fen>Deformer</fen> is the one who does the reshaping.
The <fen>Patient</fen> is the entity acted on and that undergoes a change.
The <fen>Cause</fen> is an animate or inanimate entity, a force, or event that produces an effect. Volitionality is not a necessary characteristic of <fen>Cause</fen>s.
A state that holds of the <fen>Patient</fen> or a relation that holds among the constituent parts of the <fen>Patient</fen> as a result of the arranging action.
The role <fen>Time</fen> identifies when the <fen>Deformer</fen> intentionally affects the <fen>Patient</fen>.
The <fen>Place</fen> indicates where the <fen>Deformer</fen> intentionally affects the <fen>Patient</fen>.
The <fen>Cook</fen> applies heat to the <fen>Food</fen>.
This role identifes the entity that  directly supplies heat to the <fen>Food</fen>.
<fen>Food</fen> is the entity to which heat is applied by the <fen>Cook</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Temperature_setting</fen> of the <fen>Heating_instrument</fen> for the <fen>Food</fen>.
The <fen>Container</fen> holds the <fen>Food</fen> to which heat is applied.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> at which the heat application occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the heat application  occurs.
The <fen>Cook</fen>  prepares the <fen>Produced_food</fen>.
The <fen>Produced_food</fen> is the result of a <fen>Cook</fen>'s efforts.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the cooking creation occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the cooking creation occurs.
The entity that occurs at some time.
The event which designates the time at which a trajector occurs.
The period that occurs with respect to some other time.
The period in which a trajector takes place.  This period can be cyclical and, in that case, is interpreted contextually.
The event that occurs at some time.
The entity which designates the time of some trajector.  Note: this role is infrequent or non-existent in English and is included for completeness.
listRoleExamples: <fex>The wind</fex> ground the leaves into a fine powder.
<fex>The lieutenant</fex> crushed it angrily with his boot before looking back at Hencke.
Jack plucked the flower out of his morning coat and closed his fist slowly over it , crushing <fex>it</fex> into a pulp.
<fex>The strong winds</fex> deformed the structure of the outhouse.
The lieutenant crushed it angrily with his boot <fex>before looking back at Hencke</fex>.
<fex>Drew</fex> sauteed the garlic in butter.
Jim browned the roast <fex>in the oven</fex>.
Suzy usually steams <fex>the broccoli</fex>.
He baked the cookies <fex>at 350 degrees</fex> for 11 minutes.
Boil the potatoes <fex>in a medium-sized pan</fex>.
Jim roasted the chestnuts <fex>in the evening</fex>.
We baked the cake <fex>in the kitchen</fex>.
<fex>Drew</fex> cooked dinner for his friends.
Drew prepared <fex>dinner</fex> for his friends.
Drew baked an apple pie <fex>at six int he morning</fex>.
Drew prepared the soup <fex> in the kitchen</fex>.
The current <fex>President of Georgia</fex> was born in Tbilisi.
During <fex>last night's walk</fex> , I stubbed my toe.
Future <fex>eras</fex> will be vastly changed from today.
I went to the store on <fex>Tuesday</fex>.
Currently, <fex>researchers are making new discoveries very quickly.</fex>

sourceCandidateSpans.text: The Divine Collection of Four Thousand
the Araiyar Sevai or Service of Kings
